code:
/**
 * Class to handle webcam
 */export class Webcam{constructor(){/**
   * Open webcam and stream it through video tag.
   * @param {HTMLVideoElement} videoRef video tag reference
   */this.open=videoRef=>{if(navigator.mediaDevices&&navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia){navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({audio:false,video:{facingMode:"environment"}}).then(stream=>{videoRef.srcObject=stream;});}else alert("Can't open Webcam!");};/**
   * Close opened webcam.
   * @param {HTMLVideoElement} videoRef video tag reference
   */this.close=videoRef=>{if(videoRef.srcObject){videoRef.srcObject.getTracks().forEach(track=>{track.stop();});videoRef.srcObject=null;}else alert("Please open Webcam first!");};}}
